com.mongodb
Class ConnectionStatus

java.lang.Object
  com.mongodb.ConnectionStatus
Direct Known Subclasses:
DynamicConnectionStatus, MongosStatus, ReplicaSetStatus
abstract class ConnectionStatus
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for classes that manage connections to mongo instances as background tasks.

checkClosed

Whether this connection has been closed.

close

void close()
Stop the updater if there is one

ensureMaster

abstract ConnectionStatus.Node ensureMaster()
Ensures that we have the current master, if there is one. If the current snapshot of the replica set has no master, this method waits one cycle to find a new master, and returns it if found, or null if not.

Returns:
address of the current master, or null if there is none

getServerAddressList

abstract java.util.List<ServerAddress> getServerAddressList()
Gets the list of addresses for this connection.
